reviewText:
this movie set is 3 tapes with 4 stories on it
Appropriate Adults,Quarry,Dead Male One,and No Refuge.
Jack frost ( David Jason) as usual is on top of his game
His personal life is a bit up and down but his ability to get ahead of his boss and his paper work is realistic!
Good movies and good British crime drama's
chfancier"fancier of good movies"

David Jason is a good actor and in Jack Frost he has a playing edge!
Always a step ahead of his boss and get the crimes solved
this is a good movie and enjoyed it
chfancier"fancier of fine movies"
